newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 7,088 to dollar on May 23 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 7,088 to dollar on May 23 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's central bank (BNR) said on Friday it had calculated the indicative rate of the local leu currency at 7,088 to the dollar for May 23.

The rate, which is not compulsory for book-keeping operations or inter-bank deals, is used by the finance ministry, customs authorities, prosecutors' offices and police as well as for statistical purposes.
It is computed daily, based on prices quoted by commercial banks operating on Romania's foreign exchange market. The rate was 7,085 leu to the dollar on Thursday.
